english_example_sentence: You, if you don't walk carefully on the slippery icy road, will definitely fall.
russian_example_sentence: Ты, если не будешь осторожно идти по скользкой обледенелой дороге, обязательно упадешь.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen, kaygan buzlu yolda dikkatli yürümezsen, kesinlikle düşeceksin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen, kaygan buzlu yolda dikkatli yürümezsen, kesinlikle ______.
